domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

text:
@marklevinshow Now, I don't know if this is a HIPPA violation, as some have suggested, so I can't address that.
But what I do know is that Mark is unbelievably stupid.
1, not hydroxychloroquine.
2, prescribed in 2008, 11 years before this coronavirus existed.
3, it was given to prevent malaria.
